snippet.title: Drag Racing: Club Wars - Android Gameplay HD
snippet.description:
SUBSCRIBE TO MY CHANNEL -http://www.youtube.com/user/androidwheels?sub_confirmation=1
Drag Racing returns to Android, bigger and better than ever! The hit game that launched the legendary Creative Mobile Drag Racing series tears up the drag strip with new features, improved graphics and expanded gameplay.
LOTS OF CARS
Would you pick an iconic Skyline GT-R, a classic 69' Mustang, or a brand new BMW M3 as your ultimate driving machine? Do you dream about seeing 1000+ HP exotics pushed to the limit on a drag strip? This game includes virtually every sports car for you to enjoy. That's right, 20+ BRANDS: Chevrolet, Ford, Dodge, BMW, Volkswagen, Honda, Nissan, Mazda - and more! Supercars? Check. Street racers? Check. Classic muscle? You bet! The best part? There's always more of them coming.
REAL RACERS 
In Drag Racing the real action is in the "Online" section. Go head-to-head against your friends or random racers, or race against 9 players at once in real-time competitions. If you like to race on the go or offline, we’ve got you covered with loads of Career and Class Challenges.
CLUB WARS
A new addition to the Drag Racing series, now players can join Racing Clubs in-game and take their club to the top of the leaderboards! Club features include membership rosters and in-game chat, so players can talk with racers from around the globe!
MASSIVE UPGRADES
Everyone loves a good stock car, but we know what you really desire is to PUT THE PEDAL TO THE METAL! Drag Racing has a fresh new advanced upgrade system, featuring car parts and modifiers.
GET UNDER THE HOOD
Are you a gearhead or a car geek? We have the most realistic physics engine in the genre, meaning that everything works the way it does in real life. Try to find the right balance between power and grip while staying in your class. Go deeper and adjust gear ratios to shave off precious milliseconds. Oh, and don’t forget to add in some nitrous oxide to give your ride an extra kick!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Download link - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.creativemobile.dr2
